s0460.literal: Crown prince cannot be tattooed, tattoo his tutors and teachers.'
s0460.idiomatic: Crown prince cannot be tattooed, tattoo his tutors and teachers.'

s0461.literal: Therefore laws greatly used, Qin people orderly.
s0461.idiomatic: Therefore laws greatly used, Qin people orderly.

s0462.chinese: 及孝公卒，太子立，宗室多怨鞅，鞅亡，因以為反，而卒車裂以徇秦國。
s0462.literal: When Duke Xiao died, crown prince ascended, imperial clan many resented Yang, Yang fled, therefore accused of rebellion, and finally torn apart by chariots to parade through Qin state.
s0462.idiomatic: When Duke Xiao died, crown prince ascended, imperial clan many resented Yang, Yang fled, therefore accused of rebellion, and finally torn apart by chariots to parade through Qin state.

s0463.chinese: 惠文君元年，楚、韓、趙、蜀人來朝。
s0463.literal: Duke Huiwen first year, Chu, Han, Zhao, Shu people came to court.
s0463.idiomatic: Duke Huiwen first year, Chu, Han, Zhao, Shu people came to court.

s0464.literal: Second year, Son of Heaven congratulated.
s0464.idiomatic: Second year, Son of Heaven congratulated.

s0466.literal: Fourth year, Son of Heaven sent civil and military sacrificial meat.
s0466.idiomatic: Fourth year, Son of Heaven sent civil and military sacrificial meat.

s0468.chinese: 五年，陰晉人犀首為大良造。
s0468.literal: Fifth year, Yinjin man Xi Shou became Grand Commandant.
s0468.idiomatic: Fifth year, Yinjin man Xi Shou became Grand Commandant.

s0469.chinese: 六年，魏納陰晉，陰晉更名寧秦。
s0469.literal: Sixth year, Wei ceded Yinjin, Yinjin renamed Ningqin.
s0469.idiomatic: Sixth year, Wei ceded Yinjin, Yinjin renamed Ningqin.

s0470.chinese: 七年，公子卬與魏戰，虜其將龍賈，斬首八萬。
s0470.literal: Seventh year, Prince Ang fought with Wei, captured their general Long Jia, beheaded 80,000.
s0470.idiomatic: Seventh year, Prince Ang fought with Wei, captured their general Long Jia, beheaded 80,000.

s0471.literal: Eighth year, Wei ceded Hexi lands.
s0471.idiomatic: Eighth year, Wei ceded Hexi lands.

s0472.literal: Ninth year, crossed Yellow River, took Fenyin, Pishi.
s0472.idiomatic: Ninth year, crossed Yellow River, took Fenyin, Pishi.

s0473.literal: Met with Wei king at Ying.
s0473.idiomatic: Met with Wei king at Ying.

s0475.literal: Tenth year, Zhang Yi became Chancellor of Qin.
s0475.idiomatic: Tenth year, Zhang Yi became Chancellor of Qin.

s0476.literal: Wei ceded fifteen counties of Shang commandery.
s0476.idiomatic: Wei ceded fifteen counties of Shang commandery.

s0477.literal: Eleventh year, established county of Yiqiu.
s0477.idiomatic: Eleventh year, established county of Yiqiu.

s0478.literal: Returned Jiao and Quwo to Wei.
s0478.idiomatic: Returned Jiao and Quwo to Wei.
